text: Myraida Chaves (12 March 1960 - 22 April 2021) was a Puerto Rican actress, producer and television host and director of the Centro de Bellas Artes de Caguas. Among the television shows she hosted was Juventud 83. Chaves was the daughter of actress Awilda Carbia. Chaves died from cancer on 22 April 2021, aged 61. ==References== Category:Puerto Rican television actors Category:Puerto Rican television personalities Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Puerto Rico Category:1960 births Category:Place of death missing
title: Myraida Chaves
